title: Soil and water supervisor rallies against reliance on synthetic chemicals in public parks - Port City Daily
summary: New Hanover County, North Carolina, is piloting a project to replace chemical pesticides and herbicides with organic alternatives at Olsen Park. The project aims to improve soil health and reduce the use of harmful chemicals. The project is being monitored for effectiveness by comparing the soil health of two ballfields treated with organic methods to three fields treated with traditional methods.

title: Kohler Co. Outlines Strategy, Ambitions, and Progress in 2022 ESG Report - Contractor Magazine
summary: Kohler Co. released its 2022 ESG report highlighting their progress in environmental sustainability, diversity, equity and inclusion (DEI), and social impact. The report details achievements like reduced GHG emissions, water conservation, and diverse hiring practices.  Kohler also emphasizes its commitment to innovation, launching new products like the Kohler Rinse toilet for communities without piped water and the HeatCapture™ heat exchanger for reduced emissions compliance in the UK.

title: Retail India News: Farmley Unveils ‘Healthy Ko Rakhe Healthy’ Campaign with Rahul Dravid - Indian Retailer

title: Hindustan Unilever: Empowering Consumers For 90 Years - Inventiva
summary: Hindustan Unilever Limited (HUL) is a leading Indian consumer goods company with a history spanning over eight decades.  HUL has a diverse product portfolio, including soaps, detergents, personal care items, and packaged foods, and is known for its commitment to sustainability and social responsibility. The company has expanded its operations globally, reaching over 190 countries and contributing to the economic development of various regions.
